text: Jack Davis (September 6, 1935 - February 4, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in Chicago. He was a Republican member of the Illinois House of Representatives from 1976 to 1986, and a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from 1987 to 1989 representing Illinois' 4th U.S. Congressional District. Davis died of dementia in Springfield, Illinois on February 4, 2018 at the age of 82.Jack Davis, Former Congressman Turned WMAY/Springfield, MA Talk Host, Dies At 82 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:Disease-related deaths in Illinois Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jack Davis (politician)
